an5.93:1.1: “Mendicants, there are five ways of declaring enlightenment.
an5.93:1.3: One declares enlightenment out of stupidity and folly.
an5.93:1.4: Or because of corrupt wishes, being of wishful temperament.
an5.93:1.5: Or because of madness and mental disorder.
an5.93:1.8: These are the five ways of declaring enlightenment.”
